mapper.select:
SELECT a.id, a.title, a.date_time, u.realname, ( SELECT COUNT( 0 ) FROM activity_user WHERE activity_id = a.id ) AS nums FROM activity AS a LEFT JOIN sys_user AS u ON a.create_user = u.user_id WHERE a.del_flag = 0
AND LOCATE(#{params.title}, a.title) > 0
AND LOCATE(#{params.realname}, u.realname) > 0
ORDER BY a.date_time DESC
